TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PersistenceProvider extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class PersistenceProvider Inherits CommunicationObject

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 从中派生所有持久性服务永久性提供程序的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class from which all durable service persistence providers are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以创建从此类型派生的类，以创建使用自定义持久性存储区（如第三方数据库、文件系统或远程访问的存储系统）的持久性服务永久性提供程序。Users can create classes derived from this type to create durable service persistence providers that use custom persistence stores, such as third-party databases, the file system, or storage systems accessed remotely. 若要创建使用 Microsoft SQL Server 作为持久性存储区的此类型的系统提供的实现，请参见 。To create a system-provided implementation of this type that uses Microsoft SQL Server as a persistence store, see . > [!NOTE] > 在创建永久性提供程序实现时，必须在新提供程序的方法（如 ）中保留线程的原始标识。When creating persistence provider implementations, it is important to maintain the thread's original identity in the new provider's methods (such as . 否则会形成安全漏洞，因为在这种情况下，操作将会在错误的标识下运行。Otherwise, security loopholes could be created, because operations would then run under the wrong identity. ## Examples 有关使用文件系统作为持久性存储区的此类型的实现，请参见 DurableServiceFactory SDK 示例中的 FilePersistenceProviderFactory.cs 文件。For an implementation of this type that uses the file system as a persistence store, see the FilePersistenceProviderFactory.cs file in the DurableServiceFactory SDK sample.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 方法中的安全令牌所做的更改在不进行恢复的情况下将对该消息的其余处理保持有效。Changes made to the security token in the method, if not reverted, stay in effect for the remainder of that message's processing. 这意味着服务操作的用户代码、通过调度程序的响应消息路径以及任何错误路径都将在已更改的安全上下文中运行。This means that the service operation's user code, the response message path through the dispatcher, as well as any error paths, run in the changed security context. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现 方法。The following code demonstrates how to implement the method. 此代码示例摘自 FilePersistenceProviderFactory.cs 文件中的 DurableServiceFactory SDK 示例。This code example is part of the DurableServiceFactory SDK sample from the FilePersistenceProviderFactory.cs file. 有关更多信息，请参见 DurableServiceFactory SDK 示例。For more information, see the DurableServiceFactory SDK sample. [!code-csharp[PersistenceProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/persistenceprovider/cs/filepersistenceprovider.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool LoadIfChanged (TimeSpan timeout, object instanceToken, out object instance);

Public Overridable Function LoadIfChanged (timeout As TimeSpan, instanceToken As Object, ByRef instance As Object) As Boolean

span.span: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，如果服务状态信息数据发生了更改，则从持久性存储区中加载服务状态信息。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, loads service state information from the persistence store if that data has been changed.

returns.span: 如果使用持久性存储区中的最新副本设置 参数，则为 ，如果本地缓存状态已经是最新的，则为 。

span.span: if the parameter has been set with the latest copy from the persistence store; if the locally cached state is already up to date.

Public MustOverride Function Update (instance As Object, timeout As TimeSpan) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ Update(System::Object ^ instance, TimeSpan timeout);
abstract member Update : obj * TimeSpan -> obj

param.name: instance
param.span: 实际的实例状态。

span.span: The actual instance state.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 时间段，永久性提供程序在该时间段后将中止此尝试。

span.span: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，在持久性存储区中更新服务状态记录。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, updates service state records in the persistence store.

returns.span: 与刚保存的状态相对应的实例标记。

span.span: The instance token corresponding to the state just saved.

returns.span: 可以将其传递给 ，以确定持久性存储区中的状态是否与调用 Create 时的状态不同。

span.span: This can be passed to to determine whether the state in the persistence store differs from the state when Create was called.
